meanings: conquest, subjugation, 극복하다 overcome, conquer, surmount, subjugate, weather, cope with, get over, tide over, deal successfully with

vlive.korean: '오빠, 다이어트 침체기의 고민은 어떻게 극복해?' "Oppa, how do you overcome the inactive period of dieting?" 듣기 View video iKON : 초코바나 먹으면서 얘기좀할까?
vlive.english: "Oppa, how do you overcome the inactive period of dieting?"

vlive.korean: '있었으면 어떻게 극복했나요?' "How did you overcome that?" 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 오랜만에 보이스🙄
'포기하고 싶을 때 어떻게 극복했어요?' "How did you overcome it?" 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 산이의 소소한 일상🥰
"윤기야 슬럼프 때 어떻게 극복했어?" "How did you get out of your slump?" 듣기 View video BTS : 슙디의 꿀 FM 06.13
vlive.english: "How did you get out of your slump?"

vlive.korean: [과연 이 위기를 어떻게 극복해나갈지...?] [How are they going to overcome this crisis?] View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY "TIME TO TWICE" - Noraebang Battle EP.03
vlive.english: [How are they going to overcome this crisis?]

examples.korean: She overcame injury to win the Olympic gold medal. 발음듣기 그녀는 부상을 극복하고 올림픽 금메달을 땄다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She overcame injury to win the Olympic gold medal. 발음

examples.korean: She overcame her natural diffidence and spoke with great frankness. 발음듣기 그녀는 타고난 소심함을 극복하고 대단히 솔직하게 말을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She overcame her natural diffidence and spoke with great frankness. 발음

examples.korean: I overcame my moral scruples. 발음듣기 나는 도덕적 양심을 극복했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I overcame my moral scruples. 발음

examples.korean: She can’t get over her shyness. 발음듣기 그녀는 소심함을 극복하지를 못한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She can’t get over her shyness. 발음

examples.korean: He overcame many personal adversities. 발음듣기 그는 많은 개인적인 역경을 극복했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He overcame many personal adversities. 발음
